channel.title: Make your own GFX?
channel.description:
I have searched the forums and the web for a software or TuT explaining how to create your own GFX. Now I haven't found any posts that have helped me the slightest bit so I have resorted to asking for help.
If someone could link me to TuT for this or just link me up to a site which explains briefly how to do this that would be great. If there is no way to make your own GFX then yea, thankyou anyway.
Oh and I 3D Model and code so yer I don't need to be spoon fed it alright.

item.title: Make your own GFX?
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

Wayzey i think we should look at how the ones in RSMV are made and try and add them and see how it works out then we can work on making some

Read full topic

item.title: Make your own GFX?
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

If you 3D model you should know this. I’m pretty sure it’s the same as making a custom model you just use class23 to add it as a gfx.

Read full topic
